trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SEQ_00<tab>Eshana needs you to track down fugitives from the law.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_TODO_00<tab>Speak with suspicious characters in the vicinity of East End.
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_TODO_01<tab>Report to Eshana.

TEXT_BANANA402_03051_ESHANA_000_000<tab>We have sssomething of a sssituation. The Alliance has been in contact, warning usss of a gang of cutthroat criminals that has essscaped cussstody and ssscattered across the border into the Fringes.
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_ESHANA_000_001<tab>Our guards immediately began a sssweep of the area, but have yet to locate these fugitives. Will you lend your eyes to the hunt?

TEXT_BANANA402_03051_ESHANA_000_002<tab>As for where you might look, I've jussst received reportsss of a few sussspicious characters traveling through Eassst End. It is not certain whether one or all of them are the criminals we ssseek, ssso temper your approach with caution and defend yourself if necessary.
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051_000_010<tab>Eh? What? What do ye want o' me?
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051_000_011<tab>...Yes? Can you not see I'm trying to hunt?
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051_000_012<tab>Was there aught I could help you with, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>? If not, might you kindly step aside?
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_A1_000_001<tab>You've the look of a fugitive.
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_A1_000_002<tab>I'm scouting for the Resistance.
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_A1_000_003<tab>(Say nothing).
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051_000_015<tab>...Aye, well, I'm a busy man. Why don't ye be on yer way then, eh?
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051_000_016<tab>Ugh, must you loiter so!? You're scaring away the game!
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051_000_017<tab>Ah. How I do adore awkward silences. You are still ruining the view, however, and I really must insist that you move along.
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051_100_020<tab>Eh? A fugitive, ye say!? Cheeky bugger─be off with ye!
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051_100_021<tab>I'm no criminal! And you've no evidence to accuse me of such! Leave me be!
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051_100_022<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Me<var 1A 01 /var>, a fugitive!? Whatever gave you that impression? I'll thank you to take your baseless accusations elsewhere!
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051_000_020<tab>Is that right? I s'pose that means I'm done runnin'!
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051_000_021<tab>Then I guess you weren't fooled by my disguise. Well...I can't have you blabbing now, can I?
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051_000_022<tab>I thought you had the smell of authority about you. Shall we get this over with, then?
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051_000_025<tab>And? What's yer bloody point?
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051_000_026<tab>...Ah, fled into the forest, did they? I've not seen any dastardly types meself, but I hope you catch 'em soon!
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051_000_027<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051_000_028<tab>...I'm not sure I follow you.
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051_000_029<tab>And you thought I might be one of them!? I hate to disappoint you, but I am just a simple hunter. Must be the goggles...
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051_000_030<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051_000_031<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051_000_032<tab>What is this all about? I've merely come with an eye for the scenery...

TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051_000_033<tab>Villains in the forest? How terrifying! I have my spear, 'tis true, but I am far more proficient with a brush. 'Twould be best if I found a new vista to paint, it seems.
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051_000_034<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONA03051_000_035<tab>Well, good for ye, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Now, how about ye try scoutin' someplace else?
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONB03051_000_036<tab>That's nice...? I'm not sure why you felt the need to tell me, but good luck with your patrol.

TEXT_BANANA402_03051_SUSPICIOUSPERSONC03051_000_037<tab>A scout, you say? Jolly good. Scout away, then. Preferably somewhere far, far away. I am trying to create <var 1A 02 /var>art<var 1A 01 /var> here.
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_ESHANA_000_040<tab>How fared your hunt?
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_ESHANA_000_041<tab>Hah! They expected hounds on their trail and I sssent them a dragon!
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_ESHANA_000_042<tab>In recent days, our neighbors' criminals have begun treating Gyr Abania as a haven─a place to essscape the fissst of jussstice.
TEXT_BANANA402_03051_ESHANA_000_043<tab>It falls to usss here in the Fringes to disssabuse them of that notion. Help usss keep our borders free of sssuch filth.
